name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior Java Engineer with a proven expertise in **Java**, **Spring**, **Spring Boot**, and **REST API** development, ensuring the delivery of scalable and efficient applications. Skilled in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines and utilizing **Azure** for cloud solutions, enhancing software delivery processes. Proficient in monitoring and analytics using tools like **Apigee**, **AppDynamics**, and **Splunk** for performance optimization. Recognized for strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, as well as effective communication and mentoring skills, driving team collaboration and successful project outcomes. Experienced in creating user-centric solutions across sectors including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, contributing to significant process improvements and innovation.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Java** and **Spring Boot** to design a microservices-based Clinical Patient Management System (CPMS), achieving **95%** accuracy in patient tracking and significantly enhancing adherence rates through automated reminders.
Developed **RESTful APIs** with Spring Data JPA, improving data accuracy by **40%** and ensuring secure EHR integration with **Spring Security** and **OAuth2**.
Established CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, reducing deployment times by **80%** while ensuring effective integration and delivery practices.
Cultivated a strong communication framework for mentoring junior developers, fostering an analytical and problem-solving culture within the team.
Enhanced UI/UX for the pathway builder using **React** and **Ant Design**, resulting in a **30%** reduction in completion time for end users.
Built a notification system with **RabbitMQ**, achieving **99%** timely alert delivery, thus improving user engagement and timely follow-ups.
Containerized microservices with **Docker**, streamlining deployment processes across staging and production environments.
Managed services on **AWS EKS (Kubernetes)** with **Terraform**, maintaining **99.9%** uptime and optimizing load handling with **Redis** caching.

Developed robust backend services leveraging **Java (Spring Boot)** and **REST API** frameworks, decreasing response times for ticketing and customer support by **25%**.
Designed a real-time notification system utilizing **Kafka** for alerts, achieving a **98%** rate of timely notifications for critical issues.
Engineered a dynamic customer insights dashboard using **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, resulting in a **20%** improvement in resolution rates.
Implemented automated testing and deployment processes through **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a consistent and efficient release cycle.
Successfully deployed applications on **AWS EC2** using **Docker** and **Terraform**, reducing infrastructure setup time by **50%**.
Exercised strong **analytical** and **problem-solving** skills to troubleshoot and enhance existing systems, mentoring junior developers in best practices and ensuring effective **communication** throughout the team.

- Developed backend REST APIs using **Java** and **Spring Boot**, ensuring robust application architecture and achieving **98%** uptime.
- Implemented the frontend with **Angular**, enhancing load times by **40%** through efficient data handling and performance optimization.
- Led testing initiatives using **JUnit** and **Mockito**, successfully reducing bugs by **30%** and improving release quality.
- Optimized frontend performance through lazy loading and code splitting, effectively resulting in faster user interface interactions.
- Deployed solutions globally utilizing **AWS CloudFront** and **S3** for low-latency access and enhanced application responsiveness.
- Collaborated on CI/CD practices, streamlining deployment processes and increasing development efficiency.
- Engaged in analytical problem-solving to troubleshoot application issues, leading to better user experiences and performance.
- Mentored junior developers, fostering growth and enhancing team capabilities with strong communication.

skills:
**Programming Languages** 
	Java, JavaScript (React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Vanilla JS, Node.js, TypeScript), Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

 **Backend Frameworks** 
	Spring, Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ

 **Frontend Frameworks** 
	React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest

 **API Technologies** 
	REST API, Apigee

 **Serverless and Cloud Functions** 
	AWS Lambda

 **Databases** 
	MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB

 **DevOps** 
	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline

 **Cloud & Infrastructure** 
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3), API Gateway, Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack, Azure

 **Other** 
	Microservices, RESTful API design, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies, analytical, problem-solving, communication, mentoring, appDynamics, Splunk
